obsess.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if something or someone obsesses you, you think or worry about them all the time and you cannot think about anything else – used to show disapproval
obsess.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Jody’s been obsessed with some lifeguard for months.
A lot of young girls are obsessed by their weight.
obsess.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Obsess is usually passive in this meaning
